resources.string:
Market Analyzer : A simple application to analyze all stock market changes. 

It is a great tool to monitor the day-to-day changes happening in the Stock Market. 

You can evaluate the changes of your favorite stocks by adding them into My Stocks category. 

Each stocks will have the informative sections like Quotes, Stock Info, Quant, News and a Historical Graph. 

The Historical Graph Section includes different graphs like 1 Day, 5 Day, 1 Month, 2 Month, 3 Month, 6 Month and 1 Year graphs. 

By using Market Analyzer you can browse through almost all major stock exchanges. 

Market Analyzer will provide informations about Index, Equity, Fund, Currency, ETF, Futures and much more. 

The News Section will provide the major headlines of the finance world.
